This was apparently very funny to Sam, and she let out what was to her a small giggle. For Christine, however, it was a very different story.
Her whole world shook. It was like being stuck in an avalanche. There was bright white flesh everywhere but she couldn't tell where was up or down. All she could feel was a systematic bounce compressing and decompressing her from all sides. All in all, noone could blame her for the terror that grasped her harder than the giantess earlier. Perhaps the only person almost as scared as her was Anthony who was still at the girls feet, and was seemingly forgotten. The tension was suddenly cut with a sudden sound.

info.brief_description: A girl named Samantha accidentally shrank you and your friend.
info.description:
Your name is Anthony. It was a typical day, you were bored so you decided to invite your friends Samantha and Christine over. They agreed, because they liked to come to your house. Here is some info on them:

Christine:She's a 5' 6" tall 15 year old Puerto Rican girl. Shes has a bad temper and a nice ass, but she isn't always the smartest girl...

Samantha: She's a 5' 4" tall 14 year old American girl. She looks a lot like an albino, she has really light white skin and platinum blond hair. Shes a nice girl with a decent temper, and she likes to mess with you. She has been acting a little strange lately but you did not really want to bother her about it.

Anthony (you): You're a 5' 8" tall 14 year old Peruvian male. You have a not so great temper, and hate to be ordered around. otherwise you usually are pretty chill.

Your parents are on a 2 year long trip, so they will not be around.
Addition rules:
1. no giant males
2. no parents involved
3. keep the storyline going, don't suddenly change the subject.
4. She shrank you two accidentally, but she decided Anthony is her slave, but she hasn't decided Christine's fate yet.
5. Anthony can't grow back.
6. No deaths
7. Otherwise add all you wish, im pretty ok with anything.
8. Please don't just add a one or two sentence chapter.
9. If you do add a one or two sentence chapter I may edit it to make it longer or change it up.
10. Otherwise have a good time.
